title: Chocolate Chip Laden Cookies
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '225g unsalted butter', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '200g porridge oats', '500g plain chocolate chips', '175g chopped walnuts']
